trans-unit.resname: Generate xlif files in order to translate the theme.
trans-unit.source: Generate xlif files in order to translate the theme.
trans-unit.target: Generate xlif files in order to translate the theme.

trans-unit.resname: 1. To translate the theme, you need to generate translation files first.
trans-unit.source: 1. To translate the theme, you need to generate translation files first.
trans-unit.target: 1. To translate the theme, you need to generate translation files first.

trans-unit.resname: 2. After generating translation files, please go to BO > "International" > "Translations" page > "Modify translations" section to translate the theme.
trans-unit.source: 2. After generating translation files, please go to BO > "International" > "Translations" page > "Modify translations" section to translate the theme.
trans-unit.target: 2. After generating translation files, please go to BO > "International" > "Translations" page > "Modify translations" section to translate the theme.

trans-unit.resname: 3. To translate the front office, locate to "Shop" > "Theme" > "%theme%".
trans-unit.source: 3. To translate the front office, locate to "Shop" > "Theme" > "%theme%".
trans-unit.target: 3. To translate the front office, locate to "Shop" > "Theme" > "%theme%".

trans-unit.resname: 4. To translate the back office, locate to "Admin" > "Theme" > "%theme%" and "Modules" > "St".
trans-unit.source: 4. To translate the back office, locate to "Admin" > "Theme" > "%theme%" and "Modules" > "St".
trans-unit.target: 4. To translate the back office, locate to "Admin" > "Theme" > "%theme%" and "Modules" > "St".

trans-unit.resname: 5. Please don\'t modify translation files manually, your modifications will be overridden when regenerating them.
trans-unit.source: 5. Please don\'t modify translation files manually, your modifications will be overridden when regenerating them.
trans-unit.target: 5. Please don\'t modify translation files manually, your modifications will be overridden when regenerating them.

trans-unit.resname: 6. Refer to the Documentation > "Translation" for more info.
trans-unit.source: 6. Refer to the Documentation > "Translation" for more info.
trans-unit.target: 6. Refer to the Documentation > "Translation" for more info.

trans-unit.resname: It is recommended to generate translation files for the front office only, because generally we do not need to translate the back office, anthor reason is that the back office has 2000+ phrases, way better more than the front office\'s 300+ phrases, those 2000+ phrases would slow the translation page down
trans-unit.source: It is recommended to generate translation files for the front office only, because generally we do not need to translate the back office, anthor reason is that the back office has 2000+ phrases, way better more than the front office\'s 300+ phrases, those 2000+ phrases would slow the translation page down
trans-unit.target: It is recommended to generate translation files for the front office only, because generally we do not need to translate the back office, anthor reason is that the back office has 2000+ phrases, way better more than the front office\'s 300+ phrases, those 2000+ phrases would slow the translation page down

trans-unit.resname: Whether export the translations in /themes/theme_name/modules folder, generally, it no need.
trans-unit.source: Whether export the translations in /themes/theme_name/modules folder, generally, it no need.
trans-unit.target: Whether export the translations in /themes/theme_name/modules folder, generally, it no need.

trans-unit.resname: Just to check whether there are any translations missed.
trans-unit.source: Just to check whether there are any translations missed.
trans-unit.target: Just to check whether there are any translations missed.
